full_summary:
=====================================

**Title:** Regulator, Voltage
-----------------------------------
### Tender Notice Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01010409
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-237369/A
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-18
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-24T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Procurement Details

* **Gross Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN):** N6110
* **Description (English):** Electrical Control Equipment
* **Description (French):** Équipement électrique de commande
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** None
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Requirements

* The Department of National Defence requires items detailed below to be delivered to Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) Montreal by January 15th, 2023.
* **Item 1:** Regulator, Voltage (GSIN: 6110, NSN: 01-141-8160)
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: EA

### Submission Guidelines

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* Due to COVID-19 pandemic impacts, proposers are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Danny Lebel
* **Contact Email:** [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)

### Attachments

* Bid Solicitation document: [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/5fd8236f66c61643e5ded50334819108/w8485-237369a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf) | [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/7865d23842a2dce862c54403c8cf67b9/w8485-237369a_bid_solicitation_fr.pdf)
